#summary how to use the shared themes

<div style="width: 600px;"
<p>
1. Please distinguish between blogbus old themes system and the new one.<br/>
If you cannot implement the downloaded themes in one system, try another one.
</p>
<p>
2. Download and unzip the themes you want, and paste the source code to these corresponding modules.<br/>
This http://bangzhuzhongxin.blogbus.com/logs/4519414 html will help you to do this.
</p>
<p>
3. Right click, "Open with...", Notepad to open the html or css file in the packages.
</p>
<p>
4. You can modify the Index and Log modules (in old system), or Index and Detail modules (in new system) to specify yourself's link in the navigation.
</p>
<p>
5. If you are implementing a 3 columns theme in the new system, you can do the 2nd step first. And adjust the sidebar(1) and sidebar(2) to what you want.
</p>
<p>
6. If you have any further questions, you can go to the http://bangzhuzhongxin.blogbus.com the check the reference. Go to http://bbs.blogbus.com to ask some questions, or email support#blogbus.com directly.
</p>
<p>Thanks!</p>
